thread.title: The Academy Awards Royally F*cks Up And Pulls A Steve Haryvey By Awarding The Wrong Movie The Best Picture Oscar
thread.title_full: The Academy Awards Royally F*cks Up And Pulls A Steve Haryvey By Awarding The Wrong Movie The Best Picture Oscar

author: Jorge Alonso
title: The Academy Awards Royally F*cks Up And Pulls A Steve Haryvey By Awarding The Wrong Movie The Best Picture Oscar
text:
During tonight’s Academy Awards, Warren Beatty announced “La La Land’ as Best Picture. About 10 minutes into La La Land’s speech and with everyone on stage, the Academy announced that Beatty read off the wrong name and that “Moonlight” was actually the Best Film. 
According to Beatty he wasn’t trying to be funny but was given the wrong envelope by the Academy. Wow
